name: Skyhawk Aviation (Pty) Ltd - Rustenburg
about: Skyhawk Aviation (Pty) Ltd, based at Lanseria International Airport but with operations at Rustenburg Airfield, is a comprehensive flight training institution dedicated to providing the highest standard of pilot training. Established to fill the niche for high-quality, personalized instruction, Skyhawk avoids the "sausage machine" approach, ensuring students benefit from experienced instructors. The school offers a wide range of courses, including Private Pilot License, Night Rating, Commercial Pilot License, ATPL Preparation, Instrument Rating, and Flight Instructor ratings. Training is conducted on traditional flight instrument-equipped Cessna 172 and Piper Seneca aircraft, preparing students for the realities of commercial aviation. Skyhawk's Career Pilot Program allows aspirants to progress through a structured career path, including working as flight instructors. The school is committed to setting students on a solid foundation for their future careers in aviation.
